title: Verify that confirmation emails are sent for a package with an event priced $1000 or greater
custom_steps:
1. Create a package and package event list with 
2 or more events.
Expected Result:
Package should be created sucessfully
2. Price a buyer type at $1000 for the events in 
the package.
3. Sell on tickets at the $1000+ buyer type and 
attempt to send a confirmation email.
Expected Result:
Confirmation emails should be sent regardless 
of ticket price.

attempt to send a confirmation email.

title: Verify that Row details for printable tickets are displaying correctly in e-mail confirmation for Print Later status package sale transaction.
custom_steps:
1. Launch PV application using valid login credentials.
Expected Result:
The user should be able to launch and login the application successfully
2. Navigate to Ticketing Setup >> Package 
Administration.
Expected Result:
Package Administration page should be loaded 
properly.
3. Create an package with associated 
event's  Ticket Printing Status as Print Later.
Expected Result:
Package should be created successfully
4. Try to complete a sale Transaction using the 
above Package.
Expected Result:
Transaction completed successfully and confirmation screen should be displayed with e-mail confirmation section.
5. Click on Send under E-Mail confirmation available in ticket sale confirmation page.
Expected Result:
Email confirmation should be sent to the recepient mail id mentioned under email confirmation section with ticket details
6. Verify the email send to the mail id.
Expected Result:
Make sure that the row details should be printed without $nbsp followed by the row info.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch PV application using valid login credentials.
2. Navigate to Ticketing Setup >> Package 
Administration.
3. Create an package with associated 
event's  Ticket Printing Status as Print Later.
4. Try to complete a sale Transaction using the 
above Package.
5. Click on Send under E-Mail confirmation available in ticket sale confirmation page.
6. Verify the email send to the mail id.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The user should be able to launch and login the application successfully
2. Package Administration page should be loaded 
properly.
3. Package should be created successfully
4. Transaction completed successfully and confirmation screen should be displayed with e-mail confirmation section.
5. Email confirmation should be sent to the recepient mail id mentioned under email confirmation section with ticket details
6. Make sure that the row details should be printed without $nbsp followed by the row info.

title: Verify in the Email confirmation whether  no roll Up happens for the Redelivery the same order after Claim Reservation for a  package list has 2 events and if each event has different  adult to child ratio
custom_steps:
1. 1.Create 2 events 
2. Create 2 Package Event list and include the events created above 
3.Create 2 Package
4. Add the Package Event list to Package
Expected Result:
1. User should be able to Create 2 Package Event list and a Package.
2. Package event list above Craeted should be Added to the Package
2. Launch the PV application
Expected Result:
User should be able to login
3. Click on ticket Sales
Expected Result:
Ticket Sales Page should be Opened
4. Search for the  Master Package created above and Search for the Patron
Expected Result:
User sholuld be able to Search for Package created and the Patron
5. Select the Seats for PEL 1 (2 adult and 2 child seats with same seat range ) and then click lock 
seats
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to Select the Seats
6. Select the Seats for PEL 2 (2 adult and 2 child seats with same seat range ) and then click lock 
seats
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to Select the Seats
7. Click on Reserve and then Click on Set to reservation
Expected Result:
Selected Tickets should be Reserved
8. Click on Checkout
Expected Result:
Transaction should be completed
9. Go to Ticket Service , search for the same order
Expected Result:
System should navigate to Ticket Service Page and user should 
be allowed to search for the same order
10. Select the action as Claim Reservation
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the action as Claim Reservation 
from the action drop down
11. Select the tickets for Claim Reservation and then Click Apply Actions
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the Tickets to claim the 
Reservation and user should be navigated to Delivery page for 
the same order
12. Select the Tickets for redelivery and click on Apply actions
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the Tickets to Redelivery
13. Select the Delivery method and click apply
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the Delivery Method
14. Select the Payment mode, provide the Required values and then click Accept Payment
Expected Result:
Transaction should be completed
15. Go to Ticket Service , search for the same order then Click on Deliveries tab and click on the 
delivery ID
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to click on the deliveries tab and select 
the Delivery ID
16. Select the Tickets for redelivery and click on Apply actions
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the Tickets to Redelivery
17. Select the Delivery method and click apply
Expected Result:
User should be allowed to select the Delivery Method
18. click on Checkout and Verify whether the Transaction is completed
Expected Result:
Transaction should be completed
19. In the confirmaiton Page once the Transaction is completed , in confirmation Email Tab click on Send
Expected Result:
Message should be sent to the Email Id specified
20. Verify in the Email confirmation whether  no roll Up happens for the Redelivery the same order after Claim Reservation 
for a  package list has 2 events and if each event has different  adult to child ratio.
Expected Result:
No roll Up Should happen for the Redelivery the same order after Claim Reservation for a  package list has 2 events 
and if each event has different  adult to child ratio.

title: Verify if Async mode is false for Email Configuration Profile, it is not overriding Async mode at the service provider level
custom_steps:
1. Async mode is false for Email Configuration Profile
2. Launch PV Application
Expected Result:
The Application should be launched successfully.
3. Login as cmuser
Expected Result:
Login should be successful
4. Navigate to system admin
Expected Result:
User successfully navigated to systm admin
5. choose EMAIL CONFIGURATION PROFILE  from the drop down
Expected Result:
User successfully navigated to Email Configuration Profile setup page.
6. Create a Config profile
Expected Result:
Config profile is created
7. Update the same by setting the status to active
Expected Result:
User successfully updated the Config profile with active status
8. Go go Putty and verify the log file 'pv-api-client.log',
Expected Result:
Each entry should have an ID which is used to associate the request with the response.
9. Review API requests/responses to/from Mandrill.
Expected Result:
Send async and sync emails or send flag to email service provider should be verified in  outgoing and incoming details in the logs
10. Verify if Async mode is false for Email Configuration Profile, it is not overriding Async mode at the service provider level
Expected Result:
Not overriding Async mode at the service provider level

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Async mode is false for Email Configuration Profile
2. Launch PV Application
3. Login as cmuser
4. Navigate to system admin
5. choose EMAIL CONFIGURATION PROFILE  from the drop down
6. Create a Config profile
7. Update the same by setting the status to active
8. Go go Putty and verify the log file 'pv-api-client.log',
9. Review API requests/responses to/from Mandrill.
10. Verify if Async mode is false for Email Configuration Profile, it is not overriding Async mode at the service provider level
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 
2. The Application should be launched successfully.
3. Login should be successful
4. User successfully navigated to systm admin
5. User successfully navigated to Email Configuration Profile setup page.
6. Config profile is created
7. User successfully updated the Config profile with active status
8. Each entry should have an ID which is used to associate the request with the response.
9. Send async and sync emails or send flag to email service provider should be verified in  outgoing and incoming details in the logs
10. Not overriding Async mode at the service provider level
